description: This header file declares the function 'DoMount' within the 'omi' namespace, which performs mounting operations for container root filesystems using an ImageMounter object. It contains include guards, includes the <string> header and another header 'mntfsimg.hpp', and defines the function prototype along with relevant comments.

methods.name: DoMount
methods.description: Performs the mounting of a container's root filesystem image using an ImageMounter object, taking container identifiers, filesystem paths, and returning the container path or error message.
